s1.message: The following lists the changes compared to Adblock Plus 1.3.6. If you experience issues with this release please check the list of known issues.

s2.message: Brasilian Portuguese translation has been added again.

s3.message: Slightly decreased delay when new browser windows are opened.

s4.message: Fixed: Tabs on Flash and Java mights leak memory under some rare conditions.

s5.message: Fixed: When images are highlighted via list of blockable items the flashing border isn't visible.

s6.message: Fixed wrong suggestion in filter composer (

s8.message: Fixed: Undesired side-effects of resizing the list of blockable items if an extension like Vertical Tabs is installed (bug 23890).

s9.message: Fixed: Filter statistics aren't reset in Firefox 4 if browsing history is cleared on browser shutdown (forum topic).

s10.message: Fixed: List of blockable items and context menu don't work correctly in Firefox 3.5 and SeaMonkey 2.0 (bug 23890).

s11.message: Fixed: Bogus tooltip text shows up for the cross button next to "Recommend us on Facebook".
